SEARCH
Package com.example.view

Class Prompt

Object
Prompt
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPrompt
Direct Known Subclasses:
PromptOption
public class Prompt extends Object implements IPrompt
Prompt class is in charge of displaying the question to the user as well as allowing them to input their responses to the questions. Depending on the situation different types of prompts are required - some with Regex, some where inputs are optional and the default value of the parameter must be specified, some where inputs are compulsory. Prompt takes care of all of these. There are many different types of constructors for Prompt to match these needs

    • startPrompt

      public void startPrompt()
      method to start prompting. It checks for a mismatch of input: for example, if the user has not entered any value but it is a compulsory prompt. Or if the user's inputted value does not match specified regex. Then it will continuously prompt the user - and will not move on to the next prompt - till the input conditions are satisfied
      Specified by:
      startPrompt in interface IPrompt

    • getResult

      getter method to get the result of the prompt

      getResult in interface IPrompt
